short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AlAjr is an exciting new online shopping reward.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AlAjr is a cashback extension for Muslims to shop online from the leading 3000 eCommerce stores, earn cashback on each sale and donate their cashback to Islamic charities. AlAjr provides discounted deals, offers and cashback on each sale. Users can request their cashout in PayPal or donate to other Islamic charities.
